ai-patthana22.10:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.10:1.1_0: Not with the skilled in the fine-material sphere, nor by the fine-material sphere, conditions give rise to the fine-material sphere.
ai-patthana22.10:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.10:2.1_0: Not with the skilled in the fine-material sphere, nor by the fine-material sphere, nor by causes and reasons.
ai-patthana22.10:2.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
